posts.post_content:
Looking for a nice graded Dots Miller and Wild Bill Donovan (throwing) card.  PSA or SCG is fine.  2.5 to 4 rating.  The ones on eBay are somewhat over-priced, IMHO, and the ones that aren't don't have a great 'look'.  

Anyway, PM or EMAIL if you've got one or both you're looking to sell....

Hey man, I have both cards in SGC 50.  Shoot me your e-mail address and I'll send scans over.

Marty
